# 学科发展 {#progress}
 
当前川师在励精图治奋力耕耘，推动学科发展，其中工程学科与阈值线最为接近，达到97.8%。其他各学科的学科发展进展见表 \@ref(tab:iris) 。

## 潜力学科

```{r iris}
univ_discip_cum_last_ten_year %>% 
  filter(univ_cn == "四川师范大学") %>% 
  select(discipline_cn, cum_cited, Threshold0326) %>% 
  mutate(prop = cum_cited/Threshold0326) %>% 
  arrange(desc(prop)) %>% 
  mutate(prop = scales::percent(prop, accuracy = 0.01)) %>% 
  dplyr::rename("学科" = discipline_cn, "被引频次" = cum_cited, 
         "阈值线" = Threshold0326, "接近程度" = prop) %>% 
  knitr::kable(
  caption = '四川师范大学进入22ESI学科接近程度',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
  
```

## 竞争对手

师范院校top30高校工程学进入ESI学科的14所，未进入的16所
```{r}
univ_discip_cum_last_ten_year %>% 
	filter(discipline_cn %in% "工程学")  %>% 
  count(is_enter_one_percent)
```


```{r}
univ_discip_cum_last_ten_year %>% 
	filter(discipline_cn %in% "工程学") %>% 
  filter(is.na(is_enter_one_percent)) %>% 
  mutate(prop = cum_cited / Threshold0326) %>% 
  select(univ_cn, cum_paper, cum_cited, Threshold0326, prop) %>% 
  arrange(desc(prop)) %>% 
  mutate(prop = scales::percent(prop, accuracy = 0.01)) %>% 
  
  dplyr::rename("学校" = univ_cn, "累积论文数" = cum_paper, "被引频次" = cum_cited, 
         "阈值线" = Threshold0326, "接近程度" = prop) %>% 
  knitr::kable(
  caption = '工程学科有可能ESI学科的师范大学',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
```
